Posts.Content: hi hope ur feelin better, i also had tamoxifen and zoladex injection back in 2005. i wasnt realy warned about the side effects of wot is essentialy an enforced menopause. in the end i felt i was goin abit mad to b honest. So if u ever feel the same ,just remember u are not mad and u r not alone. sorry iv nothing more positive to say. wish u all the best.much love, paula xx
Posts.Title: Do the hot flushes and lack of sleep ease any?
